SEARCH
Package controller

Class PhotosInAlbumController

java.lang.Object
controller.PhotosInAlbumController
public class PhotosInAlbumController extends Object
Controller class for managing photos within an album. This includes displaying photos and their details, adding and removing photos, updating photo captions and tags, and navigating between photos.

  • Method Details

    • setData

      public void setData(Album album, List<User> members, User user)
      Initializes the controller with data for a specific album, user, and list of users. It sets up the photo list and tag list views.
      Parameters:
      album - The album being viewed.
      members - The list of all users.
      user - The current user.

    • addPhoto

      public void addPhoto(javafx.event.ActionEvent e) throws IOException
      Handles adding a new photo to the album from the filesystem.
      Parameters:
      e - The event triggered by clicking the add photo button.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs during file selection or photo addition.
